Home.intro: Hey! Welcome to my site - I'm Joanna. A frontend developer who writes, does creative stuff, and tries to find the balance between mom life and a hundred new ideas per minute. Here you'll find a collection of all my projects and initiatives. Make yourself at home! 🧡

aboutMe.title: A few words about me...
aboutMe.part_1: 💭 I look for excuses to ponder and converse
aboutMe.part_2: 🎙️ I create s podcast and 💌 a newsletter
aboutMe.part_3: 🌱 I advocate for growing at your own pace
aboutMe.part_4: 📚 I believe in lifelong learning and deep work
aboutMe.part_7: 🚀 I inspire others with my contagious enthusiasm and drive for action

newsletter.title: Newsletter "Pretekst do rozmyślań"
newsletter.description: Name translates to: "A Pretext for Reflection". I write about personal development, creativity, and technology. I share my thoughts, experiences, and inspirations. I recommend books, podcasts, and tools that help me grow. A new issue every two weeks in your mailbox. Join today! 💌

podcast.title: Podcast "Pod Pretekstem"
podcast.description: Name translates to "On the Pretext". Join me in searching for pretexts to reflect and converse. The topics we'll explore include coding, well-being, balance, motherhood, notes, development, planning, and rest. But really, anything can be a pretext for reflection. Listen on your favorite podcast platform or on YouTube 🎧

blog.title: Blog wakeupandcode.pl
blog.description: A collection of articles about changing industries, learning coding, and taking the first steps in IT. Plus, some life musings, reviews of interesting content, and doses of motivation to act 🌱

group.title: FB Group "Programuj, dziewczyno!"
group.description: Group name translates to "Let's code, girl!". IT, coding, and motivation in a girls-only group. Join over 30,000 members who are crazy about the world of IT and programming. We support each other, learn, and grow together 👩🏻‍💻

ig.part_1: For snippets of life, new technologies, and a handful of thoughts

devto.part_1: For collection of my thoughts on technical topics

mail.part_1: If you feel like reaching out to me

Home.footer: © Wake up and Code Joanna Otmianowska 2024. All rights reserved.
